page.title: 08A GAMEKEEPER'S DAY
page.content: Charlie Barron is a gamekeeper and he works with the Head gamekeeper,Mark Alderson,on the estate that occupies most of the land in the grid.Charlie has seven dogs.Four Jack Russells that are used for rabbiting and for foxes and three black labradors that are used for gamebird retrieving. Charlie covers his territory both on foot and in the Land rover. He covers roughly twelve miles a day.His main daily jobs are walking round the moors watching for poachers;keeping the Buts and roads in good repair;and looking for vermin. He only uses one type of fire arm which is a double barrel twelve bore gun. He enjoys all his jobs and couldn't choose a favourite. One day he caught a black fox and sent it to a taxidermist .
